data.eml:eml: The genus Laccobius in China: new species and new records (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jia, Fenglong, Gentili, Elio, Fikáček, Martin (2013): The genus Laccobius in China: new species and new records (Coleoptera: Hydrophilidae). Zootaxa 3635 (4): 402-418, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.4.4
